Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply and I'm sorry they took 7 months to find it and treat you but so glad you are doing well I had my biopsy today dr told me she was going to write stat on it so I can get results fast. Whatever it is I know I'll be okay but of course we always have that worry right ? Thank you again
Posts.Title: Help with Breast Ultrasound

Posts.Content: Hi, im 27 years old and recently had a bilateral breast ultrasound. The findings were the following, 1 o'clock i cm from the nipple subcutaneously, there is a mildly lobulated solid nodule 1 by 0.8 times 0.6 LIKELY A FIBROADENOMA. IT IS CATEGORY BIRAD 4 Im getting a breast biopsy tomorrow, should i be worried?? why is it bird 4 but likely a fibroadenoma??? lobulated solid nodule aren't the characteristics of a fibroadenoma.. anyone has this?
